text: Thomas Boggs (1944–2008) was an American musician. Thomas Boggs may also refer to: *Hale Boggs (Thomas Hale Boggs Sr., 1914-disappeared 1972), American politician from Louisiana and majority leader of the U.S. House of Representatives *Thomas Hale Boggs Jr. (1940–2014), American lawyer and lobbyist, son of Hale Boggs *Tom Boggs (poet) (1905–1952), American poet, editor, and novelist *Tommy Boggs (born 1955), American baseball player
title: Thomas Boggs (disambiguation)
